title: curious
body: If i was to make a new acc and play all my games from lv1-lv30 and win the majority of them will my rank placements be any different to if i loss them all? and by different i mean will i get matched with higher elo players or does it not matter?

replies.body: Normals have their own MMR your normals games have no effect on your placements or ranked games
no. All unranked accounts start around a mid silver level. Silver 3-2 or so.
